ResearchProjectDef.label: golem creation Vol. I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of the Golem Forge, a forge capable of creating inactive golem. As well as the creation of root and ogrim root golems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: golem creation Vol. II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of flesh golems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: golem creation Vol. III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of stone and metal golems.

ResearchProjectDef.label: golem core creation Vol. I
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of basic golem cores at the golem forge. These can be installed into golems, providing passive bonuses.\n\nUnlike most cores, these can be installed multiple times, increasing the level of the installed core four additional times.

ResearchProjectDef.label: golem core creation Vol. II
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of golem work cores at the golem forge. These can be installed into golems, allowing them to perform various jobs.

ResearchProjectDef.label: golem core creation Vol. III
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the construction of golem focus cores at the golem forge. These can be installed into golems, allowing them to perform various ranged attacks while drafted.

ResearchProjectDef.label: advanced golem core creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of golem upgrade cores, as well as the creation of aetherial golem hearts, at the golem forge.\n\nAdditionally, the quality of all newly activated golems is increased by 1 level.

ResearchProjectDef.label: golem shifter crystal creation
ResearchProjectDef.description: Allows the creation of golem shifters and golem shifter cores at the golem forge. These are small crystals that attach to a belt, and allow the user to teleport golems to their location.\n\nGolems must have the golem shifter core installed in order to make them targetable with the shifter crystal.
